original_text: They refused to obey you. They forgot about all the miracles that you had done to help them. Instead, they turned against you. They chose a leader to take them back to Egypt, where they had been slaves. But you are a God who forgives people. You are kind to people. You are slow to get angry and your love for your people always continues. So you did not leave your people alone.
korean_text: 거역하며 주께서 그들 가운데에서 행하신 기사를 기억하지 아니하고 목을 굳게 하며 패역하여 스스로 한 우두머리를 세우고 종 되었던 땅으로 돌아가고자 하였나이다 그러나 주께서는 용서하시는 하나님이시라 은혜로우시며 긍휼히 여기시며 더디 노하시며 인자가 풍부하시므로 그들을 버리지 아니하셨나이다

sentences.original_text: They forgot about all the miracles
that you had done to help them.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 그들을 돕기 위해 행하셨던 모든 기적들을 잊어버렸습니다.

sentences.original_text: They chose a leader to take them back to Egypt,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들을 이집트로 돌려보낼 지도자를 선택했습니다.

sentences.original_text: But you are a God who forgives people.
You are slow to get angry
and your love for your people always continues.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 백성에 대한 사랑은 항상 계속됩니다.

sentences.original_text: So you did not leave your people alone.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 당신은 당신의 백성을 혼자 두지 않으셨습니다.
